title: Measurements
fullText:
Insulation resistance should be measured by self-contained instruments such as a direct-reading ohmmeter of the generator type, applying a voltage of at least 500 V. The test voltage for systems rated less than 230 V should be limited to twice the rated voltage of the equipment being tested.
NOTE: Care should be taken on electronic equipment to ensure that no damage is sustained due to the application of test voltages.
